synopsis.text:
Bee coming a Letter Bee is no easy feat, but for Lag Seeing, it's a dream born from a fateful encounter with Gauche Suede, a seasoned Letter Bee tasked with delivering him to his aunt. In the perilous outskirts of Yodaka, where the shadows of Gaichuu loom large, Lag and Gauche embark on a life-altering journey. Lag, haunted by the memory of his mother's mysterious abduction, finds solace in Gauche's unwavering dedication to his mission, inspiring him to follow in his footsteps.

In Amberground, a land perpetually bathed in twilight, Letter Bees and their protective dingos brave treacherous terrains and Gaichuu attacks to deliver more than just mail; they carry the hopes and dreams of the people. Lag, now determined to unravel the truth behind his mother's disappearance and reunite with Gauche, prepares to take the Letter Bee exam. But before he can don the badge of a Letter Bee, he must first find a dingo to accompany him on his perilous yet meaningful journey.
